thread.section_title: The Independent Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of The Independent Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: arwelclwyd
title: Perfect
text: From check-in to check-out (6 nights), The Independent Hotel was absolutely spot-on. Immaculately clean, friendly and helpful staff, comfortable rooms with free wi-fi and a great location for either walking to the main sites, or catching the Metro. Breakfast was wonderful (and an ice cream or pastry with an early afternoon coffee would see us right through to supper - even with 2 teenage lads). Could not recommend it highly enough.
